Note:
I recommend transferring these directories to ROMS directory on internal HDD of PS3 and modifying xml as follows:
<rom>
<path>/dev_hdd0/ROMS/Capcom CPS1/</path>
<path>/dev_hdd0/ROMS/Capcom CPS2/</path>
<path>/dev_hdd0/ROMS/Capcom CPS3/</path>
